mydolphin_plus__cleaning_mode.all: Regular - Cleans floor, water and waterline (2h)
mydolphin_plus__cleaning_mode.floor: Floor only - Cleans the floor only (2h)
mydolphin_plus__cleaning_mode.water: Water line - Cleans the walls and water line (2h)
mydolphin_plus__cleaning_mode.ultra: Ultra clean - Deeply cleans the floor, walls and waterline (2h)
